overview: Stuart Regan is an entrepreneur, based in London. Described by himself as a designer, creator and founder. His most recent project is [Pinch] (http://getpinchapp.com), a Mac application that simplifies video viewing for a better user experience, while also co-founding [Newslettter] (http://newslettter.com), a tech newslettter that covers interviews with startups, their founders, designers, developers and provides the latest news and updates in the tech industry.
